name: Fox Run
description:
Fox Run is an exciting endless runner game that puts players in control of an adorable fox. The main objective of the game is to deftly dodge obstacles such as boxes and sawhorses, while trying to get as far away as possible.

The main character is a charming fox, and players take on the role of him as he travels through a colorful and immersive environment. The fox must show agility and quick reflexes to avoid obstacles in its path.

Fox Run offers an addictive and challenging gameplay experience suitable for players of all ages. With its simple gameplay and responsive controls, the game promises to keep players engaged as they try to push their own limits and reach greater and greater distances in this exciting endless race.
